root: ^After clearing out the entire area, I still couldn’t find anything valuable.
^But I was so sure, something good would’ve been here
^[You see Sai returning from her group]
^Hi Dross. I see that you’re still playing treasure hunt I see.
^I ain’t playing or pretending to be a pirate.
^But even after searching the perimeter, this area is bust.
^Hey Sai, by any chance, you don’t know anywhere else that may be polluted right?
^Determined for the weirdest things I see
^Ever since we were little guppies, right?
^I think I’ve seen the objects fall near the Seaweed Forest and Coral Reef.
^We’re still cleaning the areas near the village, so if you want to help-
^[You rushed out of the area faster than any crab could imaginable]
^I guess if there’s one thing I admire about you; it is your passion once you make up your mind.
